reviews.review_msg: Good class, in QM he used blackboard extensively (almost too much). Exams were fair.

Lectures are well-structured and easy to follow and she will routinely stop and ask for questions. When questions are asked she does a good job of addressing them. Follows the course textbook closely and emphasizes the important things during lectures. HW is from the textbook and exams have similar questions.
Okay notes, poor explanation, and very little "care" factor when it comes to passing information along to students.

Easy homework questions, but harshly marked - a bit deceptive. Very good lectures. Difficult exams. Into curving.
 
 But, people skills lack; almost creepy. Won't help students at all on assign's, or in any other way. Puts in the minimum. As if he's on a "work to rule" job action, but all the time!

Very well organized notes and lectures.  Presents information in logical order at the appropriate pace. As lectures are so carefully pre-designed, there is little time for discussion during class. Assignments are fair but exams are surprisingly hard.
